headline: Is Corteva (CTVA) an Undervalued Stock to Invest in According to Goldman Sachs?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Undervalued Stocks to Invest in According to Goldman Sachs. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Corteva, Inc. (NYSE:CTVA) stands against the other undervalued stocks favored by Goldman Sachs.
